website_summaries.verdict: JBL's Endurance Jump earphones deliver huge bass in a secure, fully waterproof design.
pros: Powerful bass depth matched with sculpted, crisp highs
cons: Power Hook feature can lead to accidental powering down or up

customer_reviews.title: Returned after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Its a good headphone for the price except couple of drawbacks Corns: - Not really comfortable to wear for long time. I initially thought I need to get used to it. But even after one week it stand the same. I have a Sennheiser PMX 686G, that fits correctly in my ear but not this one as its not fit in my right ear and loosens out after some time. - Its picking lot of background noice while calling and the caller on the other side can hardly hear when we are on public. These are the reason to return this item Pros: - Good Sound quality - Battery Backup is good - Good build quality
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've always had problem of in-ear headphones just coming out of my ears. But those ones are perfect - I bought them especially to use them in the gym. They sound quality is not out of the world, but as good as it can be for the price. The touch controls are pretty sensitive but you just need to get used to them. I'm not sure how long exactly the battery lasts but I do not to have to charge them too often so it is good. Overall I am extremely happy with the purchase and would recommend these as a great workout headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: A very well fitting sports set
customer_reviews.text: The fit is what really sells this product, it's very comfortable and rock solid. The sound is good though I'm not an aficionado and don't have the best ear. The biggest weakness is the touch controls which are fiddly even when you get used to them, I still haven't been able to adjust the sound with them but as I generally have my phone with me that's not an issue for me. It's a good quality set of sports earbuds at a good price I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Muhlhause

customer_reviews.title: Extremely confortable sport headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones a few months ago and it's probably the best pair I have ever had in all features. They're very confortable and don't come off even with heavy exercise and I found the sound to be well balanced. They're waterproof, which is essential for sports headphones, but the sound doesn't get too loud because of this. Might be good to not damage your audition though. The only negative IMO are the finnicky touch controls. All in all I would give them 4.5/5.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rosmaninho

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a week, it’s comfortable and don’t fall off easily. It’s a little pity that there’s a little annoying sound in background when I listen in silent space. But after all it is valuable(good price) and convenient .
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I COULDN'T PAIR WITH WINDOWS 8.1 BUT THAT MAY BE RESOLVED BY A DRIVER UPDATE IN WINDOWS
customer_reviews.text: NICE SOUNDING IN EAR SPORTS HEADPHONES SURPRISINGLY COMFORTABLE I COULDN'T PAIR WITH WINDOWS 8.1 BUT THAT MAY BE RESOLVED BY A DRIVER UPDATE IN WINDOWS HOWEVER YOU ONLY KNOW THEY ARE PAIRED WHEN YOU GET SOUND AS YOU'RE RELYING ON YOUR BLUETOOTH APP TO MAKE THE CONNECTION HAPPEN I'D ALSO ADVISE RESETTING THE HEADPHONES IF THEY'VE ALREADY BEEN PAIRED WITH A DEVICE AND YOU WANT TO CHANGE DEVICES NOT TRIED WITH A MOBILE PHONE YET WHICH THEY MAY BE MORE COMPATIBLE WITH GOT THEM WORKING IN LINUX AND WITH A UGREEN TV BT ADAPTOR OTHERWISE A GOOD PAIR OF HEADPHONES BUT THE TOUCH CONTROLS ARE VERY SENSITIVE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much useless bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality good ( had better with cheaper sets). Range solid 25m if unobstructed 8/10m if bric walls are in the way. Build quality excellent, thaugh it's to be expected at this price point. Ergonomics god awful!!! Touch controls become useless if covert in sweat or water. The sensor designed to save battery interpreted me dropping down on a bench the best time to shut down ( it powers back up automatically though any music player has to be restarted manually). There are cheaper sets that deliver same performance and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Henrikas V.

customer_reviews.title: A very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my over-ear headphones for running. These earphones are fantastic! They are super easy to connect via Bluetooth to iPhone or Ipad and have pause/play control built-in. They come with three different sizes of rubber earbuds so you can get the fit just right. I have run and cycled with these. They're comfortable, lightweight and don't fall out! Volume control is good and noise cancelling works well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael H

customer_reviews.title: it's good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is worth its price. BUT YOU CANNOT USE IT WHEN YOU SWIM! It seems like that the wave of water can does your finger's job. I wear it onece when I swim, it cannot work normally and its sound qualidy declines because of water. But when I airdry it, it works well again. So its just a normal water-proof blueteeth airphone with an extent of negative sound-block effect. It won't break when you put it in water not deeper than 1 meater within 1 houur, but it can't work under water.
customer_reviews.author: Violet7693

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but they didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Had to send them back after a couple of weeks as they weren’t charging correctly and a full night of charge would give me about 20 mins of use even though the box had all the lights on the front lit. Comfy though and great for running.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very low and even after you have turned up the sound on your phone to the maximum they are still low do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bought two pairs, both had the same sound fault
customer_reviews.text: Had the same issue as some other reviewers. After a few weeks, one of the earphones went quiet, barely audible. Sent them both back. Clearly this is a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stewie

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out, not durable however
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few bluetooth in-ear earphones in the past. What is great about these is that the two earplugs (while being somewhat larger) are really everything there is to these, so the cable can move around freely. This makes them very well suited for sports that involve a good deal of movement, say running. Unfortunately, I had high hopes that a JBL product (which is significantly pricier than its competitors) would be more durable. That's not the case. I've been very careful with these, but after just a few months (and usage only during workouts), the left earplug has ceased to work. Not good enough!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these headphones is superb! Clean bass and vocals. The battery life is something to be admired though as I can’t get the expected life out of these however I still have enough for a couple of workouts off a full charge and honestly what more can you need? Build quality is great - as should be expected from a prestigious brand like JBL. The main issue I’ve had is finding the right size ear piece to fit me but once you find the right one you are immersed into a cinematic experience! Amazing headphones and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Raffo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but sound like crap
customer_reviews.text: These are certainly comfortable and well put together but the sound is shocking. It's clear enough but it's extremely tinny with lower frequency sound more or less lost. I bought these to use on the bike and in that regards they'll do but this is not the "deep, powerful JBL sound" I was promised.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard M

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, tight fit, great for running
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a month now and can't speak for durability, but the sound quality is pretty good. It doesn't block all external sounds - which is not that bad when running outdoors anyway - and it's a bit fiddly to get it to fit right but when you do it's secure and I can run without worrying that they will fall off. I have small ears and have struggled to find a set that fits well in the past. I had no problems pairing with my Android and the battery lasts for a long time. Overall good quality and good value for money. Let's see how it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Luiza Furquim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: They stay firm and fit while running or doing any activity I've tried them with. The sound quality is fair, but that's not really the point for headphones to be used while working out. The only criticism is the volume control, which I've not been able to make work.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo Capone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable headphones but awful sound quality and annoying controls
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable and lightweight for working out in but the sound quality is very bad. Too thin and tinny for music to be enjoyable. Only suitable for podcasts or where the ambient noise in the gym /pool is so great that you don't care at all about sound quality. The controls are also very annoying to operate; too difficult to turn on but then the slightest knock will pause the playback.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these earphones. Yes they are JBL and have the good sound quality that you would expect. Problem is the left ear earphone does not charge in the case and is an absolute pain in the arse to connect everytime you want to use the earphones. Have to start messing about with them a good 20mins before I go to the gym to get them to connect and then the left ear tends to die as it didn't actually charge. I'd like to say it's a one off problem but reading more and more reviews it's a common fault
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent, could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for over a year now and when they are good they are good however would buy a different true wireless because of constant hit or miss charging of left earbud which is a common fault as well as the case not charging buds at all unless plugged in contrary to advertised. Very comfortable, sound okay well constructed but now looking for something a bit more user friendly and less hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stay in place but dreadful sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great design, once I’ve put them on they don’t move at all - the design works in that respect. Unfortunately the sound quality is terrible - really terrible. To get anything like the kind of tinny sound that comes out of a teenager’s phone speakers you need to ram the earbuds into your ear to the extent that you hear every impact of your feet on the floor and your own breathing. I’m going to persevere and see whether the fit outweighs the terrible sound.
customer_reviews.author: GaryM

customer_reviews.title: I really hate these. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: If you choose the right size ear tip, it hurts. Any other size falls out when you move around and doesn't make a good enough seal for decent sound quality. The touch controls are also abysmal - they're simultaneously imprecise and over-sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goode

customer_reviews.title: Charging doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months, a case stopped charging my right ear piece. I tried charging when case is fully charged or wired, nothing helps. I ended up with a working headphones that I'm unable to charge. For this price I'd expect something more lasting than that.
customer_reviews.author: sabinka

customer_reviews.title: Finally I've found the ones
customer_reviews.text: This is my at least 10th pair of Bluetooth headphones, I'll be happy if they're my last. Sound isolation is better than the powerbeats 2 or anything else I've had, sound quality is decent (my wmh-1000x3 spoil me), best of all they are solid on my head! There's something about my ears that repel earphones, these are sitting in perfectly not moving a bit. Without blasting me with loudness they drown out the garbage gym music.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Switch off in water
customer_reviews.text: Switch off as soon I'm in water and if I switch on again few sec later switch off again. Wire is very short a few cm would make a big difference. But its good for running sound quality is good but I don't think it's good for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Supernaan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit / average sound
customer_reviews.text: These are a good product, with a nice design, but are let-down by their mediocre sound quality. I own plenty of JBL products and they all have a certain sound dynamic. They are very clear, but lack bass and high-frequency detail. For workouts in the gym or sports, the fit is secure though, if you can live with the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones but fit men’s ears better
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones but fit better on men’s ears, not ladies. Great sound off them and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound quality and they're great for workouts. Battey life is great. Touch controls are sensitive but you get used to it. For the price, you can't do much better.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work when I'm swimming
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this product. It is design to work in the water but is not. The button is so soft that water was able to switch it off. On top of that as soon as my head touch the water it lost the reception. Good for running nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Kubicki

customer_reviews.title: Sound is not very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as they are compatible with my new garmin watch, but I am not impressed with the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brunogn

customer_reviews.title: Buttons too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: The button are too sensitive, anything that lightly brushes the sensor activates all sorts. Plus any drop of sweat or rain also sets it off too causing annoyance and disrupt. If the buttons were the ones where u had to press down then it would be fine. In hindsight. I wish I hadn’t bought these
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: They stay in place, they sound good and they look OK. The volume control is virtually impossibe to use ...I just use the phone to control the volume. The other controls work well.
customer_reviews.author: allanevo

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is poor and very tinny.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was dreadful compared to other much cheaper products. However controls and battery life superseded the cheaper alternatives. I like loud music for the gym and these are tinny and poor quality. I would either go more expensive or cheaper and get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I’m truly amazed
customer_reviews.text: I can’t decide in words how happy I’m with this purchase. For the price I doubt it could get any better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound control = pants
customer_reviews.text: Battery life on this is immense. As many other people have said with the touch sound control it's so fiddly I've never been able to use it, just end up pausing or skipping songs. Not a massive problem as I set the sound volume on my phone before I start running anyway
customer_reviews.author: F Fern

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: Well its a nice peace...worth a go ...the only problem is ..they lasted 3 months ...disapointing ...left piece stoped working
customer_reviews.author: gied s

customer_reviews.title: Very utterly poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was terrible at first I thought it was my phone but when I tried my friend phone and tablet it confirms that the headset was hopeless ....the worse headset I ever bought....sorry for being honest
customer_reviews.author: Sailasa Verebasaga

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item but not happy at all. Left earvis vibrating more and not comfortable for ears. Awaiting for refund, its been more than a week
customer_reviews.author: Jayasudha Amaresh

customer_reviews.title: Cool touch controlling
customer_reviews.text: Big too big for my ears, but I used to have same problem with most of brands. Sound quality is not that bad as some people say. Keep in mind it was designed for exercises, not listening during the walk.
customer_reviews.author: Wieslaw Niziolek

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The controls are super sensitive, so don't even think of fixing your hair once it's on! All and all a great product as it does not fall out, the sound is great and it is almost noise cancelling, but on a moderate volume, you can definitely hear cars and others around you.
customer_reviews.author: Melany

customer_reviews.title: Broke with only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was ok, controls never worked properly. But the worst thing is that it broke after only a few visits to the gym, sound ceased coming out of one of the headphones. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Really like these earphones, very comfortable and don't fall out (always my problem) great sound quality for running and doesn't completely block out surrounding noise so can be aware of what's going on. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fiddly controls and shorter than stated battery life
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would give them a try even though other reviewers mentioned the fiddly touch controls. They were correct, controls are not great and the battery did not last as long as specified. So disappointing overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: No discomfort when used for 4+ hours and almost impossible to lose. The sound quality is decent with bass coming through well enough. Great for exercise but if you love thundercat, they aren't all that.
customer_reviews.author: Heironymousslosh

customer_reviews.title: A bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The loop around my ears are a bit loose making them uncomfortable - possibly designed for a man - however they do still stay secure
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Touching
customer_reviews.text: Sound and style are both not bad. However, the most I can not be comfortable is that it’s too sensitive for touching. I just want to adjust it some times but it works and then my whatever music or voice lessons will stop or change.
customer_reviews.author: ao zhang

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok, had some trouble with left ear piece after 3 months and now won’t work after 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Sl

customer_reviews.title: Great design / bad audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Great design for workout! However, the sound quality is not good. There is a constant white noise on the back when I'm listening a song with not so many instruments. When more instruments start playing then the noise is not noticeable. Maybe that's why the headphone is so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Haritcalde

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wireless phones. The sound is really good. I used it for many diferentt sports and its amazing. Very easy to use and charge. It fits in your pocket when not in use. Truly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joana

customer_reviews.title: good product for that price
customer_reviews.text: + good quality of materials + good battery life + no issues with connectivity + very easy setup + pouch is useful +/- sound quality is decent for that price, purpose of product
customer_reviews.author: Grot Trumsel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all-round
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones! I use them for workouts in the gym and outside, stay in ear well and quality audio that you would expect from JBL products
customer_reviews.author: lee snelling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for anyone who loves music
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless earphones for deep bass and water resistant Great value for money One of the best brand for music accessories
customer_reviews.author: K Khan

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but you hear every footstep - terrible
customer_reviews.text: really comfortable but every footstep is felt tenfold through the headphones. its like your music has been interrupted by a chasing t-rex! terrible sound. only good for sitting still in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ruining headphone quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: One of the best headphones for running it stays out does not drop unlike others
customer_reviews.author: raz

customer_reviews.title: Very Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about sound quality, but after 4 months using, just stopped work. I’ve done everything to get it back but no successful. Not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sérgio Oliveira Souza Junior

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again disappointing for JBL
customer_reviews.text: When taking a phone call whilst exercising you can hardly hear
customer_reviews.author: Bluenoseferret

customer_reviews.title: Good but faulty
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has these earphones too. Mine are quiet and muffled compared to his. They’re okay to use but not to the extent they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Mears

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Great in ear but kind of echo effect when walking or eating. Very sensitive to touch which is annoying
customer_reviews.author: N. Turley

customer_reviews.title: Good for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I use them at the gym, not bad for £30
customer_reviews.author: Tee1980

customer_reviews.title: I love in-ear, earphones as the sound is deeper and less background noise. Nice sound to them.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound just like most in-ear, earphones with the added bonus of no wires hanging around the pocket etc. Nice deep and bass sound to them aswell. Would recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack allen

customer_reviews.title: Lost it
customer_reviews.text: It's good. I got it twice and lost it both times :(
customer_reviews.author: ashini

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do not stay in or on the ear, constantly falling out, battery life was far shorter than expected
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Giddings

customer_reviews.title: Slightly lacking in base but good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Could have done with more base in the sound quality but good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great for sound but if you have small ears even the smallest set will hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and sound quality. Battery needs to be charged every week for 2 hours. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tasos

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: A very good set of earphones for the gym in particular. Good for running and don’t fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality and battery great
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality & battery second to none. Other than being quite sensitive the controls work very well. Bud's become quite loose when you sweat heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great value vs quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable fit. Not the easiest to pair to begin. Very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for any type of calls
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well when making calls, very poor microphone
customer_reviews.author: A.J ABDI

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Rock Solid in your ear. Could hang upside down all day and they're not coming out. Great sound too and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Matthew paton

customer_reviews.title: Good sound good fit
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the feel and sound of these ear buds
customer_reviews.author: Yves

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Found difficult to use, buttons seem to be over sensitive, hard to use controls when in ears
customer_reviews.author: Roy Anderton

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. But it was not suited fir my ears, kept falling out. Had to return. Otherwise would have kept for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Antanas_Barabanas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfort
customer_reviews.text: Best running headphones I have had. Comfort wise they are perfect. The touch control is great when exercising but can be a pain when just carrying them around!
customer_reviews.author: KevS

product_meta.title: JBL Endurance Jump Waterproof Wireless Sport in-Ear Headphones with One-Touch Remote(Black)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black| Style Name:Endurance JUMP

JBL JUMP ENDURANCE EARPHONES
JBL JUMP Endurance are Waterproof Wireless Earphones, which deliver JBL Signature Sound with Bluetooth technology to pair
your devices and enjoy your music while working out. IPX7 Waterproof technology means it can be used for exercising in all
weather conditions. PowerHook Secure fit ear hook design automatically turns the power on/off when putting on or taking off the
earphones. SpeedCharge battery offers 8 hours of wireless playback, so you can stream high quality music without any cords interfe-
ring with your workout. Fast charge mode means that in 10 minutes, you can power your headphones for an hour of use. Transducer is 1 centimetre. Frequency response is 20 Hertz to 20 Kilohertz. Signal to noise ratio is 85 decibel. Impedence is 16 ohm.

Product details * Product type: Waterproof Wireless In Ear Earphones
 * Weight: 121.2 g
 * Colour: Black
 * Power mode: 3W RMS
 * Connection via: Bluetooth

JBL by HarmanFor over 70 years, JBL has engineered the most precise, impressive sound found in big venues around the world. Harman's mission
and vision is to make life more connected, entertaining, personalized and productive. The company combines passion and purpose
to design smart products systems, software and services to connect people wherever they are.



BOX CONTAINS
Headphones 3 sizes of ear tips 1 x Enhancer Charging cable Sport Carry Pouch 1 x Warranty/Warning card 1 x Safety Sheet/QSG
feature_bullets: The new era of listening - deep, powerful JBL sound with most precise audio quality and made with the best materials / Featuring IPX7, designed to use in all weather or sport conditions
With TwistLock and FlexSoft technologies to ensure comfort and stability during your training sessions / Lightweight, flexible and always stay put
8 Hours Wireless Playback w/ Speed Charge Battery - Bluetooth gives you high quality sound streaming without any wires to interfere with your workout - 10 min. charging enough for 1hr playtime
PowerHook Secure design fits your ear exactly for perfect wearability during any type of sport; automatically turns power on and off when you put on or take off your earphones
Items delivered: 1x JBL Endurance JUMP Headphones in Black / 3x sizes of ear tips / 1 x Enhancer / 1x Sport carry pouch / 1 x Warranty Card

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
